title: TN MRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 2147 Auxiliary Nurse Midwife and Village Assistant Posts
description: Tamil Nadu Medical Services Recruitment Board (TN MRB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 2147 Auxiliary Nurse Midwife and Village Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the ANM can grab this chance and apply for the TN MRB Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online befo...
